quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Scrubs and J.d.
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, drama, newman. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Jack Abbott from The Young and the Restless has been portrayed by which actor since 1989?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Bergman

questions.question: On the TV drama The Young and the Restless, Victor Newman has three children.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No one

questions.question: On the long-running daytime TV drama The Young and the Restless, Brad has been married to all of the following women except which one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nikki Newman

questions.question: One of the pairs (contestant - the week in which he/she was fired) is wrong.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Omarosa - week 10

questions.question: On the TV show Scrubs, J.D. and the janitor are great friends.

One of these contestants was not picked by Kwame for his staff in the final task.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Internal Medicine

questions.question: What is the janitors name on the show Scrubs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is unknown.

questions.question: What is the first name of Scrubs character nurse Roberts?
When Bill finally won, he chose the job in this city.
What is the name of the resident on Scrubs whom Dr. Cox calls the nervous guy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doug Murphy

questions.question: Does J.D. get jealous when he sees Elliot dating other guys in the TV series Scrubs?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Van Buren and Statement
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, epatha. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these is not the name of a detective who served under Lt. Van Buren in the series Law  Order?
Which lead male actor won two daytime Emmy awards in 2005 and 2007 for his role in the Young  the Restless?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christian LeBlanc

questions.question: Which statement about Law  Order character Lt. Van Buren is not correct?

options.text: Van Buren shot  a mugger at an ATM.
Van Buren pays the bills in her family.
Van Buren shot a retarded boy but was acquitted.
Van Buren was promoted to  the rank of Captain in 2005.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Buren was promoted to  the rank of Captain in 2005.

questions.question: In the Law  Order series, which of these is not a member of Van Burens immediate family?

In the long running drama Law  Order, the case that led to Van Burens promotion to Lt. was overturned.
Actress S. Epatha Merkerson received an award for her work on cancer awareness.
On The Young and the Restless, what was the plot that lead to Drucilla Winters falling over a cliff?

options.text: Phyllis was blackmailing Drucilla about the paternity of Lily
Phyllis was blackmailing Sharon about having an affair with Brad
Drucilla was blackmailing Phyllis about having an affair with Nick
Phyllis was confronting Sharon that Daniel did not kill Cassie

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phyllis was blackmailing Sharon about having an affair with Brad

questions.question: Which statement about S. Epatha Merkerson is not true?

options.text: S. Epatha Merkerson won a 1992 Obie for Im Not Stupid.
S. Epatha Merkerson was in The Piano Lesson.
S. Epatha Merkerson is a graduate of Wayne State University.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Epathas first name is Suzanne.

questions.question: Who directed Shes Gotta Have It, the first movie in which S. Epathka Merkerson appeared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spike Lee

questions.question: Which statement regarding fictional character Lt. Van Buren is untrue?

options.text: Van Burens first name is  Anita.
Van Buren is a graduate of the John Jay College in New York City.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Buren wears dreadlocks.

questions.question: On The Young and the Restless TV series, Nikki Newman had recurring flashbacks of what birthday in her life that lead to a tragic death?
Sheila Carter from The Young and the Restless had plastic surgery to look like Lauren.
When did S. Epatha Merkerson join the cast of Law  Order as Lt. Van Buren?
Character Kevin Fisher had what occupation when he was initially introduced on the Young and the Restless series?

options.text: tending: She goes back to being an unhappy man whos stuck with a penis. There are millions of us out there.
tending: I could be a lot less unhappy.

rek: I really dont like you.
